subject: Basketball
Homosexuality
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Harris’s discrimination lawsuit against Penn State Coach Rene Portland didn’t simply open a dialogue nationwide, it also unveiled the sordid side of prejudice at work on the N.C.A.A. level.
snippet: Jennifer Harris’s discrimination lawsuit against Penn State Coach Rene Portland didn’t simply open a dialogue nationwide, it also unveiled the sordid side of prejudice at work on the N.C.A.A. level.
